summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 5988 for the improvement of 25th Avenue West from West Smith Street to approximately 170 feet south of West Ray Street; and certain other streets and avenues; by sewers and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 80213, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
